name: 劉碩雅
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Essential Reading Sounds Good
1	Introduction	Introduction
2	Unit 7: P. 73	Unit 7
3	Unit 7: P. 79	Unit 7
4	Unit 8: P. 83	Unit 8
5	Unit 8: P. 89	Unit 8
6	Unit 9: P. 95	Unit 9
7	Unit 9: P. 101	Unit 9
8	Mid-term Examination	Mid-term Examination
9	English Proficiency Test	English Proficiency Test
10	Unit 10: P. 105	Unit 10
11	Unit 10: P. 111	Unit 10
12	Unit 11: P. 117	Unit 11
13	Unit 11: P. 123	Unit 11
14	Unit 12: P. 127	Unit 12
15	Unit 12: P. 133	Unit 12
16	Review
17	Final Examination	Final Examination
18	English Proficiency Test	English Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
期中會考 15%
期末會考 15%
期中考 21%
期末考 28%
出席率 7%
課堂小考 14%
materials:
1.	English Reading and writing: Essential Reading (3)
2.	English Listening and Speaking: Sounds Good (4)
